item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Thanks to the 30+ folks who came out to Durty Nelly's for the last debate. We were a little tight on space so we've upgraded our venue. SO BRING A FRIEND THIS TIME, preferably an undecided one. Please join us at upstairs at the BLACK ROSE on Wednesday, September 7 to watch the fourth GOP primary debate of the presidential cycle. The debate being hosted by NBC/Politico/ Reagan Library and will take place in Simi Valley, CA. At the time of this posting, the following candidates have confirmed that they will be at the debate: Cain, Johnson, Romney, and Santorum. It's safe to expect Bachmann, Gingrich, and RON PAUL will join them, maybe even Hunstman, McCotter, and/or Perry. The debate is scheduled to start at 8PM EST. We have the upstairs reserved from 7:30-11. Stay tuned; we're going to find out which local garages if any Black Rose validates parking for.
item.name: Boston Debate-Watching Party
